resources.string: While reading is about recognizing, writing the kana is about recalling the image of it in your mind. This can create a deeper connection during the learning process, and is very beneficial! However, we understand if your goal is not aligned with the need to write. So, we have created the option to turn off all writing related stats and functions. You will be able to turn it back on at any time, and turning it off and on will not reset progress.
